author: felixweber
title: Bridge Builders Mentorship Program
description: There is a lack of professional, community driven initiatives to help Funded Proposers building their projects in an professional manner
solution: Building a Community Team of Experts, able to offer Expertise, Guidance and Mentorship for Funded Proposers to move to the next level
experience: Experts in Business,Finance and Management.Veteran-Full Time Community Members,Funded Proposers & Community Advisors,Catalyst Circle members
